    Black Aracnia led Darkmouse deep into the innards of Trypticon. As foar 
as she was concerned, she was the commander now. She single handedly saved 
the ship, and the dominance of the Predacons as well.
    "Alright you parasitic slut, you'lll be caged here until I talk with 
Megatron. Your boyfriend is eight levels up, and the internal weponry is 
still armed and ready so I suggest you stay put." Aracnia said, motioning 
with her gun for Darkmouse to enter the vault where energon was formerly kept.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

    The mirk of the swapms was the thickest in all the beast wars. No other 
place was as dismal or dark as the swamps that bordered the Predacon and 
Maximal territories. They were vast, deep, and housed some of the most 
dangerous prehistoric creatures anyone had seen.
    Among all the chaos of the bugs and aquatic life of the swamp, a long 
lost and forgotten stasis pod slipped from its peach and floated to the bank 
of a body of water.
    The computer, now able to activate, began the DNA scanning process to 
select the beast mode of the protoform within. The sphere rose, and scanned 
the vast area of the swamp. After a double pass, it selected the most 
powerful beast mode according to the habitat.
    The sphere rejoined the pod, and the transformation began. Moments past 
and the computer bagan to read off the data needed by the new form to survive 
in the beast wars.
    With a crack, the door opened and the new warrior crawled out of the pod 
and on to the bank of the swamp. He looked around. With the complete history 
of the beast wars stored in his data banks, he would be able to handle 
himself in this new world.
    Looking, he said to himself, "Ah, this beast mode shall make a fine body. 
Now all I need to do is to transform."
    Paralysis said the code word and his Predacon Beast Mode emerged. The 
frog changed into an armored knight of the Predacon dynasty. He was armed 
with a toxen gun, a semi-automatic pistol, and optic lasers. 
    "Ha! Now to contact the Predacons...and to end the reign of the Maximals!"
